imdb.title: Eria 88
imdb.plot: In the early 1980s, a war is raging in Arslan, a fictional Middle Eastern kingdom. Mercenary fighter pilots from all over the world are hired or shanghaied to fight. They live in a secret desert airbase called Area 88.

episodes.title: Sabaku no tsubasa
episodes.plot: Shinjou, a Japanese war photographer arrives to the secretive Area 88 airbase to do a piece on the war, but also to find out more about Shin, the only Japanese fighter pilot there.

episodes.title: Yûhi no bohyô
episodes.plot: One of the top pilots on the airbase is Boris, once an accomplished RAF pilot, now a mercenary torn by survivor's guilt. He's known as the Angel of Death due to his eerie luck - he's usually the sole survivor in team skirmishes.

episodes.title: Sôkû no faindâ
episodes.plot: The mercenaries hear about a downed shipment of enemy gold and fly to search for it. Shin grows suspicious of Shinjou's interest in him. It seams that the photojournalist has an ulterior motive for being there.

episodes.title: Uragiri no kumo
episodes.plot: Shin's F-8 Crusader jet is taken down over the desert by the enemy rebels' new MiG-21. He survives the crash, but sandstorm hits. Gustav, the base mechanic, and Shinjo try to locate him. Shin wonders why his best friend shanghaied him.

episodes.title: Kachiki na Rûju
episodes.plot: The airbase welcomes its first female fighter pilot. She is Kitori Palvanaff, a competitive hotshot Mirage pilot and airbase commander Saki's cousin. The men on the base try to woo her, but only uninterested Shin sparks her interest.

episodes.title: Kodoku no kôsaten
episodes.plot: Shin takes his new jet on a test flight. He recollects the day he met Ryoko, the love of his life. At the same time, Satoru Kanzaki, Shin's malicious best friend who tricked him into joining the war is taking a pilot exam on the same rout.

episodes.title: Suîto sorujâ
episodes.plot: The enemy has hit the supply routs, so the airbase is running low on fuel and ammo. The enemy bombers arrive to obliterate the nigh defenseless base and Shin, Kitori and young self-doubting North African pilot Kim Aba must stop them.

episodes.title: Suna no jûdan
episodes.plot: A deadly enemy sniper hidden in the desert surrounding the airbase forces the base to go into lockdown. The only one there who had dealt with snipers before is Shinjou. He suggests a risky plan.

episodes.title: Onsoku no taito rûpu
episodes.plot: The pilots are sent on a retaliatory bombing run. The target is a rebel oil refinery. The only problem is that they need to fly through a long, narrow and very dangerous canyon to get to it. Curious Shinjou joins them.

episodes.title: Unmei no kontorêru
episodes.plot: The enemy has a new combat ace that no one can beat. The airbase command is worried. Shin's colleague Micky Simon, a hotshot pilot and combat ace himself, is saddened to realize that the enemy pilot might be his old favorite trainee.

episodes.title: Suna no shinjitsu
episodes.plot: Shin finally has enough money to pay for his way out of the war, but becomes reckless. Shinjou is finally forced to admit why he's really there and suffers consequences. The reason behind Satoru Kanzaki's betrayal is also revealed.

episodes.title: Kaze no suna
episodes.plot: After finding out the truth from Shinjou, Shin makes a desperate suicidal attempt to escape Area 88. Is this it for Shin, or is there a way to make things right before the inevitable tragedy happens?
